product_identification.notes: Unique int64 identifier for every product (e.g., 4699796451). Must be captured to distinguish specific models.

schema_type.description: Yandex separates abstract 'Models' (Product) from specific 'Offers' (Seller Listings). Variants are often separate Models linked by logic.
schema_type.attribute_mapping: Critical: Attributes utilize localized keys (e.g., 'Ekran diagonali') which must be mapped to canonical keys via category-specific schemas.

seller_extraction.recommendation: Extract basic info (Name, ID, Rating) from Offer page. Use business ID to construct profile URL.

optimization_tips.public_endpoints: None found. Mobile API (m.market...) is also SSR/Hydrated HTML, not simple JSON.
optimization_tips.mobile_strategy: Use Mobile User-Agent to encourage lighter DOM, though structure remains similar.

data_sources.offers_section: Found on /p/{id} or /product--{slug}/{id}?tab=offers. Lists ALL sellers.
data_sources.specs_section: Found on /product--{slug}/{id}/spec. Contains full key-value attributes.

recommendation: Use 'Category Walker' strategy with robust Residential Proxies and persistent Cookies. Focus on extracting LD+JSON for clean data.
